summary:
- **Buy-back Type**: Other buy-back (Nasdaq-listed Class A/B common stock repurchase program)  
- **Total Authorization**: USD $2 billion (combined 2021 + 2025 programs)  
- **Purchases to Date**: USD $703.5M executed under 2021 program (as of 31/07/2025)  
- **Daily Activity (31/07/2025)**: 11,527 shares bought for USD $338,324.37 (avg. ~USD $29.36/share)  
- **Price Range**: Highest USD $30.75 (15/07/2025), Lowest USD $14.88 (29/09/2022)  
- **No ASX CDIs Repurchased**: Program targets Nasdaq-listed shares only  

*Note: No material impact on ASX-listed securities (NWS)*.
